title: accidentally said no to update
body:
please help me, leagues asked to update my shortcut and i clicked no accidentally. now the game wont stop loading and i cant go into a game lobby to play.
i am also pretty bad with computers... so please if you could dumb it down for me, that would be great!
thanks

replies.body: It's okay, it just sounds like League requested administrator privileges but was denied.  Run through each step of the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide, and that should help restore access.  :D  Let me know if you have any questions!
I love how Red Tracker is 90% porocles. Must be hard responding all day.
